MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL48 postcode area of Penrhyndeudraeth, affecting properties in Penbryn and surrounding streets. Our emergency response team has managed to restore power to a number of properties, and we are working to restore power for those customers still off supply. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of reports of grounded overhead lines and our team are now working to get the power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by midnight. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7:08pm on 23rd December 2020.
